message: I am being generous, take it or leave it.
I'm being slightly more fair this time. Consider it carefully, because I'm not sure I'll get any better next round!
This is a fair offer.  Inflation is eating into the total.  Agree now before it gets worse for both of us.
Okay, Alice, let's try this again. This is a better offer than the last round. Time is running out, and we both lose the longer this goes on.
